data.description: Motivated seller ready to negotiate! This property offers endless potential and charm. The spacious kitchen with amenities leads to cozy bedrooms and a lovely bathroom that can be transformed into a luxurious oasis. Fresh paint in some rooms, hardwood flooring, and a wood-burning fireplace create a warm and welcoming atmosphere. The unfinished basement presents an opportunity for expansion, with a full bathroom already in place. With stunning lake views near, the property can accommodate multiple households, making it a rare find. Ample storage and motivated seller add to its appeal. Whether you're seeking a peaceful retreat or a spacious family home, this property is a canvas for your imagination. Don't miss the chance to unlock its full potential - schedule a showing today.
